Package net.matuschek.http

Interface Summary
HttpDocManager An HttpDocManager does something with an HttpDoc.
HttpToolCallback Callback interface to inform a frontend about the state of the current HttpTool download operation
 

Class Summary
DownloadRule This class implements a rule what documents should be downloaded based on file size and mime type
DownloadRuleSet This download selector decides if a file should be downloaded based on the mime type and the size of the content (content-length header)
ExtendedURL This class represents an URL that contains also a argument (e.g.
HttpConstants Constants for HTTP
HttpDoc A HTTP document.
HttpDocForget Simple document manager that does nothing.
HttpDocToFile DocumentManager that will store document contents in a file.
HttpHeader This object represents a HTTP header.
HttpTool Class for retrieving documents from HTTP servers.
SystemOutHttpToolCallback Simple HttpTool callback that prints information on stdout
URLLogger Simple document manager that logs the URL of the document to a given Writer
 

Exception Summary
DocManagerException Exception that will be thrown by HttpDocumentManagers
HttpException Exception that will be thrown on HTTP errors
